Posts.Content: Akanksha wrote: My aunt had been diagnosed with breast cancer 3 years ago. She had been undergoing chemotherapy but the cancer continued to spread. In her last stage with the doctor expecting just one and a half month with chemotherapy,she has been advised radiotherapy which was to enable her for one more year.Her radiotherapy started 2 days ago but unfortunately, she is having seizures every evening, even today morning. She is reporting weakness and numbness everyday. What do the symptoms indicate and how should i help her out during her seizures? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Seizures between radiotherapy Akanksha susaninicking
